docs.abstract: James Poniewozik notes that two television portrayals of OJ Simpson murder trial, ESPN television documentary OJ: Made in America and FX drama The People v OJ Simpson: American Crime Story, offer contrasting yet complementary perspectives on events and history leading up to it.

headline.main: Two Astonishing Views of O.J. Simpson and His Trial
